public class FeaturesLoader
extends java.lang.Object

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

printReviewFeatures

public static void printReviewFeatures()
This method generates a text file of review features, which are the Review objects' feature table.

readUtilFiles

public static void readUtilFiles()
This utility method reads in the text file containing top noun phrases and the text file containing stop words. They are both stored in Array Lists

readReviewFeatures

public static void readReviewFeatures()
This method reads in the text file containing all of the previously generated Review objects and parses out the values needed for a new Features object. Each review object has a Features object created, and then the Features object is added to a HashMap where the key is the review ID, and the value is the Feature object.

getNP

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getNP(java.lang.String text)
This method checks to see if a word is part of the top NP list

Parameters:
text - the review text passed in
Returns:
an array list of 1s and 0s representing the text as top NP or not top NP

getReviewLen

public static int getReviewLen(java.lang.String text)
Get the review object's text length

Parameters:
text - The text of a review as one String
Returns:
the length of non-stopword tokens in a review's text
